text: It's the 19th of May 2012 - It's the Champions League final. Bayern vs Chelsea.
#Chelsea beat Barcelona in the semi-finals, Bayern beat Real Madrid.
The biggest game in club football. Welcome to Munich. The home of Bayern...and some home it is.
One very bold selection. Ryan Bertrand starts in midfield.
Chelsea team - Cech - Bosingwa - Cahill - Luiz - Cole - Lampard - Mikel - Kalou - Mata - Bertrand - Drogba.
Chelsea subs - Turnbull - Essien - Romeu - Torres - Malouda - Ferreira - Sturridge.
Bayern team - Neuer - Boateng - Lahm - Contento - Ribery - Robben - Schweinsteiger - Kroos - Tymoshchuk - Muller - Gomez.
Bayern Subs - Butt - Van Buyten - Petersen - Olic - Rafinha - Usami - Pranjic.
The referee for the game is Pedro Proenca.
Kick off is moments away here in Munich.
Unsere Stadt, Unser Stadion, Unser Pokal. They said...
The players are on the pitch. The hosts against the underdogs.
The music. The flags... The Champioooooooonnsss.
0' - Lampard to Drogba and we are under way!
0' - Early touches for Cech and Neuer.
0' - 29 seconds and Kroos is down from a Cole foul. Game on.
2' - YC - Schweinsteiger booked early for handball in midfield.
4' - Ribery down the wing, goes to cross, misses the ball and collapses in front of the #Chelsea fans.
5' - Already 5 minutes in, a fast start from Munich. #Chelsea yet to settle.
7' - Kalou does well and beats three. Finds Drogba but over hits the cross. Out of reach of champions league débutante Bertrand.
8' - The last time #Chelsea were in a champions league final Bertrand was just ending his loan at Oldham Athletic.
10' - Drogba comes deep to rob the ball from Ribery and the Ivorian wins the free-kick.
15' - #Chelsea fans are in fine voice. 15 minutes in, Cech goes long to Drogba but Bayern win second and third balls and break. #Chelsea sat deep.
18' - Pressure building. Bosingwa misses his kick - another corner. Cech leaps and clears.
20' - 20 minutes, Robben shoots Cech keeps it out via the woodwork corner. Cleared first scare.
22' - #Chelsea break Kalou offside. #Chelsea return to their shape quickly.
24' - 7 corners to Bayern already, latest well claimed by big Pete.
28' - Robben free-kick hits the wall.
30' - Quick passing from #Chelsea sees Bertrand one on one with Lahm who stands strong to block our man. 0-0.
32' - Bosingwa reads the pull back and intercepts. Ball falls to Cech who boots to half way.
32' - #ChelseaFC end up with free-kick on the edge of the box. Cahill fouled.
34' - Mata takes the free-kick. It's up and over the wall - sadly it goes over the bar too.
35' - Ribery shoots wide. Seconds later Muller volleys wide. Chance after chance now but all lacking the quality to open scoring.
37' - Lampard finds Drogba but the Ivorian can't get the ball under control. Chance gone as Kalou tries to beat two.
38' - Another attack from Chelsea finds Kalou with more space, his shot at the near post forces a save. 0-0.
40' - Ribery volley sliced and falls to Muller who doesn't react quickly enough.
43' - Mario Gomez blasts over after a Penalty shot after Luiz is a tad late & ballooned over the bar, best chance so far.
44' - Almost HT now fast first half. #Chelsea fans sing about Dennis Wise, loud and clear. No real clear chances since Kalou's shot.
45' - HT - Bayern 0 #Chelsea 0.

HT - [ad] your ad here?
ATT - 69,901 here at the Allianz Arena.
46' - Second half under way. #Chelsea attacking towards our own fans.
48' - Bayern keeper out quickly to stop Kalou getting on the end of Lampard's through ball.
50' - 50th minute Drogba blasts one at goal. Well wide but hit sweetly.
54' - Robben shoots. Cole blocks but it falls to Ribery who puts it in. Offside flag saves the blues. 0-0.
56' - Kroos takes on a shot from range. Wasted. Tension building now.
60' - Another Bayern corner. Drogba heads behind for another. One hour in. Standing strong.
65' - Lampard tries to find Drogba Bayern making it hard to link up.
68' - Muller tries to beat Cole. He can't. Excellent defence again. Another corner leads to another corner.
72' - Malouda being readied to replace Bertrand. Drogba rolls a challenge but cross cleared. Bertrand's name sung loud and proud.
72' - SUB - Bertrand off - Malouda on.
73' - Neuer fumbles but Drogba screws his shot. 0-0.
75' - Cole blocks but slices up and Cech tips it over the bar. Another corner. Under real pressure now.
77' - Muller has time and space takes it early and screwed wide. 0-0.
80' - Cole is booked for a foul on Muller.
80' - YC - Cole.
81' - Robben cross as Muller climbing over Cech to get on the end of it. that's a warning.
82' - Next cross and Muller scores 1-0. #Chelsea really do need a hero now.
83' - GOAL - Muller.
83' - Torres ready to come on.
83' - Kalou off as the PA goes mental. Muller Muller Muller over and over again.
83' - SUB - Kalou off - Torres on.
85' - Luiz booked for a clumsy foul on Robben. still 1-0.
85' - YC - Luiz.
86' - Muller is off and celebrates like he's won it.
86' - SUB - Muller off - Van Buyten on.
87' - Mata finds Torres who runs the line and falls but wins the corner.
88' - Mata takes. and Drogbaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!! what about that. A thunderous header. He's done it. The big man for the big occasion. 1-1.
88' - GOAL -  Drogba.
88' - 9 goals in 9 cup finals for Drogba. 1-1.
90' - Drogba free-kick. Last chance to win it here and now, but blasts over.
90' - FT - Bayern 1 #Chelsea 1. Extra time needed.
90' - ET under way. The 5 previous finals that needed extra time were settled on penalties.
92' - Torres drives into the box is bundled over but gets up to chase the ball. No penalty.
93' - Right down the other end and Bayern are on the edge of the box - ball finds Ribery.
93' - Drogba with lazy tackle from behind. Trips Ribery who collapses. Penalty. #formerblue Robben to take.
95' - CECH SAAAAAAAAAAVE!!!!!!!
95' - This is unbelievable! A brilliant stop low down to his left.
95' - PEN - Saved - Robben.
96' - Robben blast over with his next chance. Big Pete. Hero. 1-1.
97' - Ribery is gone. Olic on. Luiz avoids a second yellow for a foul.
97' - SUB - Ribery off - Olic on.
99' - Van Buyten barges Drogba into the hoardings 9 minutes into ET. Belief draining from Munich #Chelsea building. We believe.
103' - Robben handles in midfield. Right at the end of the first half. Torres turns well to cross headed away by Lahm.
105' - HT in ET now. Breath. Drink. Breath.
106' - And we are all ready to go in the second half.
108' - Cahill and Luiz injured, lacking match practice and playing off pure desire and adrenalin for the shirt.
110' - Drogba downs Olic, gets in behind & shoots across goal, goes wide. Olic suggests it was a cross. #Chelsea escape.
112' - Olic launches into Cahill but no foul given. Another Bayern attack begins.
113' - Lahm in behind finds a cross Cahill throws his body on the line to block and then Luiz clears.
113' - Cahill has cramp in his right leg and has to go off for a brief moment.
114' - #Chelsea are running on empty now. Mata is struggling. Drogba is stretching.
115' - 5 minutes to go.
117' - Robben free-kick floated into Cech. Very poor.
118' - Luiz punts one out of play at the halfway line. All 22 players know it is penalties. Everyone shattered and empty. They've given everything.
119' - Torres booked for dissent after a rare break forward. And time is up.
120' - FT in ET - Bayern 1 #Chelsea 1. The 10th final to be settled by penalties.
FT/ET - Blue flags flying high in the Chelsea end. Decisions being made who and when by Di Matteo for the pens.
FT/ET - Almost time and the Keepers shake hands, big chance to be a hero for them.
FT/ET - Lampard indicates to the team it is at the Bayern end.
PEN - Lahm first up. Scores. Cech goes close but can't keep it out. 1-0.
PEN - Mata next. 1st for Chelsea. Too central and it's saved. Neuer looks huge and saves well. 1-0.
PEN - Gomez bottom corner. Cech goes the right way again. Unstoppable.  2-0.
PEN - Luiz, the curly haired wizard, long run up. Blasts it home.  2-1.
PEN - Neuer next. The goalkeeper. Beats Cech to his bottom right side - squeezed in as Cech goes the right way again. 3-1. Task looks massive.
PEN - Step forward Frank Lampard super captain goal. Blasts to the roof of the net.  3-2.
PEN - Olic with his last kick for Bayern. Too straight. Cech again the right way and claws it away.  3-2.
PEN - Ashley Cole. Scored in Moscow a great game side netting right in the corner what a penalty. 3-3. Sudden death already.
PEN - Bastian. Stood Cech goes the right way gets a touch. Post out. Saved. 3-3. To win it....
PEN - This is it! Drogba his last kick of a ball for #Chelsea! The hero, the legend; one kick sends Neuer to the goal. 3-4.
The greatest night in the history of #Chelsea football club. Beaten Bayern the hard way in their own back yard. Miracle from Di Matteo.
It's our name on the trophy. #LondonsFirstLondonsFinest. A date with destiny.
He's done iiiiiiiiitttttt https://vine.co/v/eAXq1HK37XU.
#Chelsea CHAMPIONS OF EUROPE!
Drogba runs to Cech. They don't know what to do. Too tired? Shocked? Tearful coach, tearful players. Drogba hugging Lampard and Terry.
10th major trophy in 8 seasons. Led by Lampard and Drogba, what a moment. Cole and Di Matteo hug.
You know it's a good night when Ivanovic is sat on the crossbar.
Thank you & good night.
See you next year.
